Sinopsis 'Crazy Romance', Lebih Dari 'Gila' Akibat Cinta
05 Nov 2019, 18:31 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Film Korea 'Crazy Romance' akan tayang di Indonesia mulai 6 November. (dok. Zip Cinema via Klik Cinema)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Aktris Gong Hyo-jin dan Kim Rae-won bereuni dalam 'Crazy Romance', film romansa komedi yang disutradarai Kim Han-gyeol, setelah keduanya bermain dalam drama klasik Korea Selatan 'Snowman'.Crazy Romance berawal dari Jae-hoon (Kim Rae-won) yang batal menikah dan belum bisa melupakan tunangannya. Di tengah kegundahan hati, ia bertemu dengan Sun-young (Gong Hyo-jin) yang memilih putus dan langsung bersikap dingin setelah mengetahui pacarnya berselingkuh.Sun-young ternyata karyawan baru di tempat Jae-hoon bekerja. Situasi memanas ketika Jae-hoon mendengar pembicaraan Sun-young dengan si mantan kekasih di parkiran kantor.Hubungan keduanya makin rumit ketika Sun-young memilih untuk berbicara secara informal kepada Jae-hoon di awal perkenalan.Dalam suatu kesempatan, Jae-hoon membahas soal gaya bicara Sun-young hingga merambat ke perbedaan pandangan keduanya tentang hubungan percintaan dan perselingkuhan. Mereka jadi berdebat tentang pernikahan.Pandangan tersebut ternyata dibentuk dari sejumlah pengalaman dan kisah cinta yang dialami Sun-young dan Jae-hoon. Mereka berdua mulai mencari tahu romansa yang baik dan cocok untuk masing-masing.


Film 'Crazy Romance' menyampaikan kisah cinta dari beberapa sudut pandang. (dok. Zip Cinema via Klik Cinema)

Film ini diramaikan banyak aktor dan aktris yang kerap bermain dalam drama romansa komedi seperti Kang Ki-young ('EXIT' dan 'What's Wrong with Secretary Kim'). Kang Ki-young juga masuk nominasi Best Supporting Actor dalam Blue Dragon Film Awards 2019.Selain itu, Crazy Romance juga menampilkan Jung Woong-in ('My Sassy Girl' dan 'High Kick!'), serta Jang So-yeon ('While You Were Sleeping', 'The Secret Life of My Secretary' dan 'Welcome 2 Life').Crazy Romance disebut-sebut sebagai film romansa komedi Korea Selatan terbaik tahun ini. Berdasarkan Dewan Perfilman Korea (KOFIC), film yang tayang sejak 2 Oktober ini telah menjual lebih dari 2,8 juta tiket atau sekitar US$21,3 juta pada 4 November.Crazy Romance kini berada di posisi kedelapan film terlaris di Korea Selatan tahun ini dan telah diekspor ke 22 negara termasuk Singapura, Malaysia, Vietnam, Kamboja, Taiwan, Filipina, Hong Kong, Makau, Australia, dan Selandia Baru.Film Crazy Romance akan tayang serentak di seluruh jaringan bioskop CGV dan Cinemaxx Indonesia mulai 6 November.

Synopsis of 'Crazy Romance', More Than 'Crazy' Due to Love
05 Nov 2019, 18:31 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


The Korean film 'Crazy Romance' will air in Indonesia from November 6th. (doc. Zip Cinema via Klik Cinema)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Actress Gong Hyo-jin and Kim Rae-won reunited in 'Crazy Romance', a comedy romance directed by Kim Han-gyeol, after both playing in the South Korean classic drama 'Snowman'. Crazy Romance started with Jae -hoon (Kim Rae-won) who is unmarried and can't forget her fiance. In the midst of anxiety, he meets Sun-young (Gong Hyo-jin) who chooses to break up and immediately acts cold after learning that his girlfriend is having an affair. Sun-young turns out to be a new employee at Jae-hoon's place of work. The situation heats up when Jae-hoon hears Sun-young's conversation with the ex-lover in the office parking lot. The two's relationship gets more complicated when Sun-young chooses to speak informally to Jae-hoon at the beginning of the introduction. On one occasion, Jae-hoon discusses the matter of style Sun-young talks to spread to the difference in their views on the relationship between love and infidelity. They argue about marriage. The view turns out to be formed from a number of experiences and love stories experienced by Sun-young and Jae-hoon. They both began to find out a good and suitable romance for each of them.


The film 'Crazy Romance' tells a love story from several points of view. (doc. Zip Cinema via Klik Cinema)

The film is enlivened by many actors and actresses who often play in comedy romance dramas such as Kang Ki-young ('EXIT' and 'What's Wrong with Secretary Kim'). Kang Ki-young was also nominated for Best Supporting Actor in the 2019 Blue Dragon Film Awards. In addition, Crazy Romance also featured Jung Woong-in ('My Sassy Girl' and 'High Kick!'), As well as Jang So-yeon ('While You Were Sleeping ',' The Secret Life of My Secretary 'and' Welcome 2 Life ') Crazy Romance is said to be the best South Korean comedy romance film of the year. According to the Korean Film Board (KOFIC), the film which aired since October 2 has sold more than 2.8 million tickets or around US $ 21.3 million on November 4. Crazy Romance is now in the eighth position of the best-selling film in South Korea this year and has been exported to 22 countries including Singapore, Malaysia, Vietnam, Cambodia, Taiwan, the Philippines, Hong Kong, Macau, Australia and New Zealand. Crazy Romance films will air simultaneously on the CGV cinema network and Cinemaxx Indonesia starting November 6.
